entries.name: patterns/idioms
entries.content:
# R Idioms

## Prefer vectorized operations

Use vectorized functions instead of explicit loops.

## Use explicit column names

Avoid positional indexing for data frames.

entries.name: formatters/overview
entries.content:
# R Formatters

Common formatters include styler.

See: https://styler.r-lib.org/

entries.name: stdlib/overview
entries.content:
# R Manuals and Standard Library

See: https://cran.r-project.org/manuals.html

entries.name: spec
entries.content:
# R Language Definition
Version: unknown

Source: https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-lang.html


See: https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-lang.html

entries.name: linters/overview
entries.content:
# R Linters

There is no official linter; common tooling includes lintr.

See: https://github.com/r-lib/lintr
